beer.name: Old Jubilation Ale
beer.description: Our winter strong ale has a gorgeous mahogany hue, a hint of hazelnuts, and a finish reminiscent of mocha and toffee. No spices, just a perfect blend of five specialty malts. Cellarable for 2 years.
beer.grains: Two-row barley, special roast, black, chocolate, victory
Two-row barley, special roast, black, chocolate, victory
